title: Supaplex
content:
One hell of a fun Boulderdash-like game. Computer themed. And considered a classic in my eyes. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

[url=http://www.elmerproductions.com/sp/]www.elmerproductions.com/sp/[/url]____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Sex up pal
content:
Yes, a beautiful game. I once had it on my 386, and it has some great memories attached to from the short period before it randomly stopped working.

There was a topic in this forum about Supaplex a long time ago, but but it may have been lossed to the hack.

title: Re: Sex up pal
content:
Aye, I made that topic back then, IIRK. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

Yeah, it's a great game. I started a level pack long ago, perhaps I should start one again.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Sex up pal
content:
